titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at North-Hampton the 21. of Iune last past, before the Lord Lieutenant of the county, and the rest of the commissioners there assembled vpon occasion of the late rebellion and riots in those parts committed
titleStmt.author: Wilkinson, Robert, Dr. in Divinity.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon vpon occasion of the late rebellion.
C4 is a cancel; C4r line 3 ends "were". Variant: C4 is cancellandum; C4r line 3 ends "men".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
